# temporal-calendar

> A lightweight utility library for building calendar UIs with the Temporal API.

temporal-calendar provides type-safe calendar building blocks using the modern Temporal API. It supports month, week, and day views with timezone awareness, DST-safe operations, and a flexible accessor pattern for any data structure.

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs): Overview of temporal-calendar and key features
- [Core Installation](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/installation): Getting started with @gobrand/calendar-core
- [React Installation](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/installation): Getting started with @gobrand/react-calendar

## React

- [Installation](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/installation): Get started with GoBrand React Calendar

### Api

- [createCalendarAccessor](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/createCalendarAccessor): Type-safe helper for defining how data maps to calendar dates
- [createCalendarViews](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/createCalendarViews): Type-safe helper for creating calendar view configurations
- [useCreateCalendar](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/use-create-calendar): Creates a calendar instance with React state management
- [useCalendar](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/use-calendar): Retrieves calendar instance from context
- [useView](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/use-view): Gets memoized view data for the calendar
- [CalendarProvider](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/calendar-provider): Provides calendar instance to descendant components via context
- [Calendar Instance](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/api/calendar-instance): The calendar object returned by useCreateCalendar and useCalendar

### Types

- [Calendar Types](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/types/calendar): Core calendar types and state management
- [View Types](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/types/views): Types for month, week, and day views
- [Helper Types](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/types/helpers): Utility types for type extraction and component props

### Examples

- [Month View](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/examples/basic-month): Build a month calendar with data fetching
- [Week View](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/examples/week-view): 
- [Day View](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/examples/day-view): Build a day calendar with hourly time slots
- [Multi-View Calendar](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/react/examples/multi-view): Switch between month, week, and day views

## Core

- [Installation](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/installation): Get started with GoBrand Calendar Core
- [createCalendar](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/create-calendar): Create a stateful calendar instance with navigation, multi-view support, and automatic date range computation
- [Accessors](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/accessors): Map any data type to calendar dates
- [buildMonth](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/build-month): Standalone function to build a month grid
- [buildWeek](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/build-week): Standalone function to build a week with time slots
- [buildDay](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/build-day): Standalone function to build a day with time slots
- [Utilities](https://eng.gobrand.app/calendar/docs/core/utilities): Formatting, navigation, and timezone helpers
